name: DynaMaze
description:
"more stimulating than Apex Legends" -my friend Bradley

DynaMaze is a multiplayer strategy game about traversing a shifting maze. Adjust the maze to build a path to your target and keep the other players from getting to theirs.

I've been working on it since January of 2019, but I haven't really touched it in a while, so I figured I might as well release it. Bug reports and feature requests down in the comments below will be responded to, but I have added everything that I am likely to add on my own.

You can also get here through http://dynamaze.fun, which I think is cool.

Check out the soundtrack (menu music, in-game music), if you like it.

Check out more of my work: https://www.boringcactus.com/
